   sphinx-quickstart on Thu Oct 28 22:46:41 2021.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

The Python's OAM toolbox!
==================================================================
python-oam allow you to easily apply Outlier Aspect Mining algorithms and analyze the
results in your own datasets in an extensible way.

You can find more details about it in the `repo README <https://github.com/rodrigo-fss/python-oam//>`_!

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   installation

Modules and examples
--------------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   oam.preprocess
   oam.score
   oam.search
   oam.visualization
